name: uptime
help: displays the amount of time the stream has been live.

name: song
help: adds a song by a search or youtube url/id, ie. "!song avicii without you". If no search, url or id is provided, the command displays the currently playing song.

name: songs
help: shows a list of the current playlist.

name: clearsongs
help: removes all the songs from the playlist.

name: help
help: displays a list of all available commands
